thread.title: Angry fans are blaming Trump for 'jinxing' the Pats
thread.title_full: Angry fans are blaming Trump for 'jinxing' the Pats

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Angry fans are blaming Trump for 'jinxing' the Pats
text:
Angry fans are blaming Trump for 'jinxing' the Pats #TrumpJinx Post to Facebook Angry fans are blaming Trump for 'jinxing' the Pats #TrumpJinx  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/donald-trump-new-england-patriots-atlanta-falcons-jinx/   Angry fans are blaming Trump for 'jinxing' the Pats Luke Kerr-Dineen , USA TODAY Sports 9:23 p.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
(Photo: Kirby Lee-USA TODAY Sports) 
Even before the game was over, many New England fans were still very irritated about something that happened hours before. 
It involved President Donald Trump who, in an interview with Bill O'Reilly ahead of Super Bowl 51 coverage, said the Patriots would win by six points against "the other team". 
"You've got to stick with your friends," he said. Trump predicts the Patriots will win the Super Bowl by 8 points. pic.twitter.com/SLgi1z7aOS â€” Washington Examiner (@dcexaminer) February 5, 2017 
And that, in many people's minds, suceeded in jinxing the Pats. @MMFlint Tomorrow's headline"Trump Jinx loses Super Bowl 51 for New England Patriots" Trump tweets the scoreboard was hacked by 400lb man".
